subject: Baseball
World Baseball Classic
lead_paragraph: Japan, whose star-studded roster includes five major-leaguers, began its defense of the World Baseball Classic title with a 4-0 win, not the rout many Japanese fans were hoping for.
snippet: Japan, whose star-studded roster includes five major-leaguers, began its defense of the World Baseball Classic title with a 4-0 win, not the rout many Japanese fans were hoping for.
